gettingStarted.title: ููููุฉ ุงูุจุฏุก ูุน ุงุณุชุฑุงุชูุฌูุชู
gettingStarted.description: EasyLanguage compatibility (TradeStation/MultiCharts), installation, data, logic and optimization.

deliverables.title: ูุงุฐุง ุณุชุญุตู ุจุนุฏ ุงูุดุฑุงุก
deliverables.compat: Compatibility: The strategy is designed for EasyLanguage, usable on TradeStation and MultiCharts (PowerLanguage). Other platforms are not compatible.
deliverables.manual: PDF manual with installation, rules and risk management.
deliverables.panel: Access to the Live Panel and 24/6 support.

requirements.title: ุงููุชุทูุจุงุช ุงูุฃุณุงุณูุฉ
requirements.conn: Stable connection (โฅ 20 Mbps) and machine with 8 GB RAM or more.
requirements.platform: TradeStation ุฃู MultiCharts ูุซุจุช (ูุทููุจ)
requirements.provider: Data provider/broker enabled for chosen instruments (ES/MES or GC/MGC).

s1.title: 1) Download and organize the package
s1.l1: Download the ZIP from the provided link.

s2.title: 2) TradeStation (.ELD)
s2.l1: File โ Import/Export EasyLanguage โ Import โ select the .ELD.
s2.l2: Open a chart of the symbol (ES/MES or GC/MGC), 1m/5m timeframe.
s2.l3: Insert the Strategy via Insert โ Strategy and select the AInside strategy.
s2.l4: Set Inputs according to /params/*.json (plan and cycle).
s2.l5: Sessions: use recommended session template (CME RTH) per instrument.

s3.title: 3) MultiCharts (.PLA) + QuoteManager
s3.l1: File โ Import PLA โ select the .PLA.
s3.l2: Open QuoteManager โ File โ Import Data โ ASCII to load /data/*.csv.
s3.l4: On chart, insert the Signal/Study and set Inputs like /params.
s3.l5: Sessions: select proper CME session template for the symbol.

s4.title: 4) Parameters, backtest and optimization
s4.l2: Backtest โฅ 2 years; metrics: Profit Factor, Max Drawdown, Win%, Sharpe.
s4.l3: Optimize within sensible ranges; use out-of-sample to avoid overfitting.
s4.l4: Risk: position sizing, stop (ATR/fixed), daily loss limits.

s5.title: 5) Trading and best practices
s5.l1: Sync system clock; minimize feed latency.
s5.l2: Start in demo for 2โ4 weeks before going live.
s5.l3: Keep a disciplined journal and update when new versions release.

logic.title: ุงูููุทู ูุฑุงุก ุงูุงุณุชุฑุงุชูุฌูุฉ
logic.l1: Regimes: context detection (trend/range) via lookbacks and filters.
logic.l2: Volatility: thresholds via ATR/averages to enable/disable signals.
logic.l3: Entries: continuation/pullback patterns by regime and instrument.
logic.l4: Management: dynamic stops/targets, trailing, daily limits.

gallery.title: ููุทุงุช ุดุงุดุฉ ูู ุงูููุตุฉ
gallery.empty: Place your images in /public/guide named ts-1.png, ts-2.png, ts-3.png to display them here.

slides.ts2: Short signal with ATRStopS and intrabar update

tsViz.title: ุชุตูุฑ TradingView
tsViz.desc: In TradeStation, the strategy shows entry/exit arrows, trade lines, ATRStopL/S labels, Long/Short markers, and events like EndOfDay. If you don't see them:
tsViz.l1: Right-click chart โ Format Strategies โ Properties tab:
tsViz.l2: Enable 'Show strategy orders on chart' and 'Show entries/exits'.
tsViz.l3: In Settings: turn on 'Use Look-Inside-Bar Back-testing (LIBB)' at 1 tick for realistic stops.
tsViz.l4: Verify Session template (CME RTH) and correct symbol/contract (e.g., MGCZ25, SILZ25).
tsViz.l5: Recommended timeframe: 1โ5 minutes; standard bars, not Heikin Ashi.

validation.title: ูุงุฆูุฉ ุงูุชุญูู ูุจู ุงูุงูุทูุงู
validation.l1: Correct symbol and expiration (ES/MES or GC/MGC; e.g., MGCZ25).
validation.l2: Proper session template (CME RTH) and expected time zone.
validation.l3: Strategy inserted and Inputs loaded from /params.
validation.l4: LIBB/IOG configured for realistic backtest; arrows/trades visible.
validation.l5: Data without gaps: range โฅ 2 years for backtest/optimization.

faq.title: ุฃุณุฆูุฉ ุดุงุฆุนุฉ
faq.q1: I don't see entries/exits on the chart
faq.a1: Check Format Strategies โ Properties: enable showing orders/entries and apply the correct session. Ensure you are not using synthetic bars (Heikin Ashi).
faq.a2: Enable Look-Inside-Bar Back-testing (1 tick) and use high-resolution data. Adjust slippage/commissions in Properties.
faq.q3: CSV data won't import in MultiCharts
faq.a3: Import via QuoteManager โ File โ Import Data โ ASCII with columns timestamp,open,high,low,close,volume (UTC) and comma separator.
faq.a4: Dynamic ATR-based stop levels for Long/Short positions. They update intrabar if LIBB/IOG is enabled.

seo.title: Terms & Conditions
seo.desc: Institutional-grade terms governing the educational, research-only use of AInside.me software tools. No warranties; user assumes all risk.

legalTerms.title: Terms & Conditions
legalTerms.p1: Our software and materials are provided exclusively for educational and research purposes. We do not provide trading signals, investment advice, or financial services.
legalTerms.p2: You must not use our tools for live trading decisions or any regulated financial activity. Software is provided "AS IS" without warranties of any kind.
legalTerms.p3: By using our services, you acknowledge that you are solely responsible for your decisions and outcomes.
legalTerms.p4: AInside.me is a software development company only. Nothing herein constitutes investment advice.

seo.title: Privacy Policy
seo.desc: We collect only minimal technical data required for software functionality. No financial or trading data is stored.

legalPrivacy.title: Privacy Policy
legalPrivacy.p1: We collect only minimal technical data needed for software functionality. We do not store financial, trading, or broker account data.
legalPrivacy.p2: Third-party integrations are used for educational display only. We are not responsible for any third-party data, services, or outages.
legalPrivacy.p3: Users are responsible for safeguarding their own devices, credentials, and data.
legalPrivacy.p4: AInside.me does not access broker accounts, execute trades, or handle funds.

seo.title: Legal Disclaimer
seo.desc: AInside.me provides educational software tools only. No financial advice. User assumes all risk and AInside.me disclaims all liability.

legalDisclaimer.title: Legal Disclaimer

legalDisclaimer.p2: Trading involves substantial risk of loss. You agree not to hold AInside.me liable for any financial losses, damages, or consequences related to the use of our software.
